sources.title: The Years Between
sources.description: Title: The Years Between Summary: An MP who had been reportedly killed in action during the war, unexpectedly returns to his family, only to find that his wife has been persuaded to take his seat in the House of Commons. Directed by: Compton Bennett Actors: Michael Redgrave, Valerie Hobson, Flora Robson Production Company: Sydney Box Productions Release Date: 8 July 1946 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 An MP who had been reportedly killed in action during the war, unexpectedly returns to his family, only to find that his wife has been persuaded to take his seat in the House of Commons.

metadata.Plot: A Member of Parliament, who had been reportedly killed in action during World War II, unexpectedly returns to his family, only to find that his wife has been persuaded to take his seat in the House of Commons.
metadata.Writer: Muriel Box, Sydney Box, Daphne Du Maurier
metadata.Actors: Michael Redgrave, Valerie Hobson, Flora Robson
